name: tyle
description:
Y not chill out and crush some tyles?  Keep your STREAK ALIVE as long as you can!

HOW TO PLAY:

- As your mouse cursor spins around, click on a tile when the cursor is white.  If you click too early or too late, you won't do enough damage and you'll have to wait until the cursor goes around again.  You can only click ONCE per rotation, so be careful!

- Build up your streak-meter and keep it alive by continuously destroying tiles.

- Break your streak 3 times and it's Game Over. 


- Green tiles are worth (1 x Level) points.

- Pink tiles make your streak meter drain faster while they are in play and are worth (3 x Level) points.

- Your best score will always be displayed on the built-in leaderboard!

------------
